data.title: ScreenHub Australia - Film & Television Jobs, News, Reviews & Screen Industry Data
data.meta_description: Announcing the government's new approach to the arts, Simon Crean provides some additional funding to Screen Australia, and a slight shock on the problematical Location Offset.
data.text:
We acknowledge Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders as the Traditional Owners of the land on which we produce ArtsHub, ScreenHub and GamesHub. We pay our respects to Elders past and present. Sovereignty has never been ceded.

ScreenHub AU is published by Arts Hub Australia Pty Ltd, which is owned by Creative Hubs Group Pty Ltd. Copyright (C) 2024 ArtsHub & Screenhub
